data: `minecraft:drying_out_timer` sets a timer for drying out that will count down and fire 'dried_out_event' or will stop as soon as the entity will get under rain or water and fire `stopped_drying_out_event`.

data.Name: total_time
data.Description: Amount of time in seconds to dry out fully.

data.Name: dried_out_event
data.Description: Event to fire when the drying out time runs out.

data.Name: recover_after_dried_out_event
data.Description: Event to fire when entity was already dried out but received increase in water supply.

data.Name: stopped_drying_out_event
data.Description: Event to fire when entity stopped drying out, for example got into water or under rain.

data.Name: water_bottle_refill_time
data.Description: Optional amount of additional time in seconds given by using splash water bottle on entity.
